div.class: fixed flex h-full w-full items-center justify-center
flex fixed z-40 full scale-150 middle-div -skew-y-6 lg:scale-100
fixed -z-50 flex flex-col middle-div text-black dark:text-white

img.class: fixed -z-40 full scale-[1.4] animate-slide touch-none object-cover blur-sm lg:scale-[1.1] lg:animate-none lg:object-contain lg:blur
img.title: myImg
